name: bulk-up
effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
